metadata.title: Fomito 12.5 Inch/32cm Flexible Arm Extension Pole with 1/4-3/8in Converter Screw for Marco Ring Light/LED Panel, for Light Stand, Tripod, Monopod Photography, Max Load 5.5lbs/2.5kg
features: 【360° BENDING AT ANY ANGLE】 Easily achieve more scene shooting such as overhand, vertical, and diagonal.
【METAL HOSE SUPER LOAD-BEARING】 Longitudinal bending load-bearing 5.5lbs/2.5kg, can work for all kinds of photography equipment.
【INCLUDE 1X 1/4-3/8" CONVERT SCREW】 Used to contact camera, monitor, led light, photography light, and other photography accessories.
【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】 Flexarm can be connected with light stand, tripod, camera cage, flash clip and other bracket, has become an essential tool for every photographer.
【MULTI-ARM INTERCONNECTED】 Multiple hosed can be interconnected and extended, so that more creative applications of photography equipment can be realized.
description: The extension arm is super strong but incredibly flexible. You can twist and bend it any way you like to reach certain angles you want when you use it with the light and stands. Compatible with ring light, flash, camera monitor, smartphone and other photography accessories with 1/4" screw thread. Specifications:Material: Metal Length:12.6"/32cm Package Included:1 x Flexible Arm 1 x 1/4" to 3/8" Screw
